Description:
Proven experience in customs clearance for goods.
Deep knowledge of applicable customs laws and regulations.
Ability to accurately estimate and calculate customs duties and taxes.
Excellent organizational skills and effective document management.
Familiarity with classification lists and customs codes.
Strong communication skills and the ability to interact with various stakeholders.
Problem-solving skills and the ability to address customs clearance challenges.
Relevant academic certification to enhance qualifications.Skills
Skills:
Opportunity to join a professional and outstanding team.
Dynamic and motivating work environment.
Professional development and career growth opportunities.
Rewards that reflect performance and excellence.
